long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ProxiedMail extensions provides creating aliases for your email to stay unexposed your real email. Also can be used as fast switcher for multiple email-providers like GMail or ProtonMail and forwarding from single proxy-email to multiple real addresses on any mailbox.

Allows receiving messages to alias-email and reply.
